mapper.select: select id , text , to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') start_date , to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') end_date from events where start_date >= to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and end_date <= last_day(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.insert: insert into events ( id , text , start_date , end_date ) values ( events_seq.nextval , #{text} , to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') , to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') )
